title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.106 - Collins Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.106 - Collins Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Collins Correctional Facility, which shall be
located in the Town of Collins in Erie County and which shall consist of
property under the jurisdiction of the department and formerly under the
jurisdiction of the New York State Office of Mental Health at that
location. (b) Collins Correctional

Facility shall be a correctional facility for males 18 years of age or
older. (c) Collins Correctional

Facility shall be classified as a medium security facility, to be used as a
general confinement facility. (d) Collins Correctional Facility shall be classified as a work release
facility. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
